DOC.brief_summary: The aims of this prospective cross over study was to compare the gastric emptying of 250 ml water in fasting volunteers, in two situations : without chewing gum or while chewing gum during 45 min
DOC.brief_title: Chewing Gum and Gastric Emptying of Water
DOC.criteria: ASA 1 or 2 volunteers digestive diseases, gastroparesis Smokers Pregnancy Diabetes Mellitus Medication affecting gastric motility Previous gastrointestinal surgery
